user.title: Jebao Pump Setup
user.description:
Choose how to add your Jebao pump to Home Assistant.

**Automatic discovery** - Scan your network for pumps (recommended)
**Manual configuration** - Enter IP address if you know it

discover.title: Network Discovery

data.interfaces: Network interfaces to scan (leave all selected if unsure)

select_device.title: Select Device
select_device.description:
Found {device_count} Jebao pump(s) on your network.

Select a pump to add to Home Assistant. Each pump shows its device ID and IP address.

manual.title: Manual Setup
manual.description:
Enter the IP address of your Jebao pump.

The pump must be powered on and connected to the same network as Home Assistant. Port 12416 must be accessible.

Example: 192.168.1.100

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to pump. Check the IP address and ensure the pump is powered on.
error.discovery_failed: Discovery failed. Try manual configuration or check your network settings.

init.title: Jebao Options
init.description:
Configure how often Home Assistant checks the pump status.

Lower values provide more responsive updates but increase network traffic.

Recommended: 30 seconds (default)
